#summary Potential Future Works

=Improvement=

==Active Accessibility==
Add support for Active Accessibility in current API to support Office series

=Sub-Projects=

==Office Trojan==
A Add-In for any application support IExtensibility2. Adapt their application object by .NET IPC remoting.

==Grid==
Wrapper for the telent text interface of QEMU, and Trojan for windows, together form a api for controlling virtual machine and its operating system. A dedicated coordinator for running Nunit tests across the grid.

Write script based on the meta-scripting language ViScript: http://code.google.com/p/viscript/
